snippet: Survivors Network had argued that the documents, mostly e-mails, should remain confidential because they contained information about victims.
abstract: Survivors Network of Those Abused by Priests turns over about 180 documents subpoenaed by lawyers for Roman Catholic priests accused of sexual abuse after losing its appeals; Network had argued that the documents should remain confidential because they contained information about victims.
lead_paragraph: Survivors Network had argued that the documents, mostly e-mails, should remain confidential because they contained information about victims.

headline.main: Missouri: Documents Turned Over in Priest’s Abuse Case
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Documents Turned Over In Priest’s Case

keywords.value: Survivors Network of Those Abused by Priests
